FuncDef: The display vlan instance mapping command displays mappings between Multiple Spanning Tree instances (MSTIs) and VLANs. The display vlan instance mapping command displays mappings between Multiple Spanning Tree instances (MSTIs) and VLANs.
ExtraInfo: After you configure mappings between MSTIs and VLANs, run the display vlan instance mapping command to view the mappings between MSTIs and VLANs.
